heroDescription: I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for building beautiful. I love to create things that make people's lives better. It's make me happy to be here. Also, I'm a big fan of the web.
contactContent: Feel free to ask me anything you want. Any questions I will be grateful to help. If it is necessary for something specific, or if some difficulty.
contactBoxContent: If there is any doubt, just write to me. Or, if you want to deal with another matter.
